ModMetaData.name: [ELIF] Detail Works
ModMetaData.description:
ELIFs Detail Works aims to offer you many ways to add detail to your colonies and spread your creativity, that fits the Rimworld aesthetic, either through structures, furniture, decorations, you name it, this mod got you covered. 

Updated: M-05/D-22/Y-2020

Translations:
German Translation by: Erdnussbrot
ModMetaData.author: ELIF
